snippet: Knowing how to use Twitter, update Facebook, check in on Foursquare and upload images on Instagram are among the digital skills some employers expect in a job candidate.
abstract: Many employers expect employees to be savvy social media users in order to land a job or flourish in current role; several universities, community colleges and online educational businesses are offering continuing education classes in digital media to help those who need to acquire such skills.
lead_paragraph: Knowing how to use Twitter, update Facebook, check in on Foursquare and upload images on Instagram are among the digital skills some employers expect in a job candidate.

headline.seo: Digital Skills Can Be Quickly Acquired
headline.main: If Twitter Is a Work Necessity
headline.print_headline: If Twitter Is a Work Necessity
